title: Generate a Shipping Label
description: A warehouse packer is ready to ship an order and needs to generate a shipping label.

tasks.description: Scan the order's packing slip to identify the order.
tasks.expected_outcome: System retrieves the correct order details, including the customer's shipping address.

tasks.description: Weigh the package and input its dimensions and weight.
tasks.expected_outcome: System captures the package's physical characteristics.

tasks.description: Purchase and generate a shipping label from the appropriate carrier based on the selected shipping method.
tasks.expected_outcome: System successfully generates a printable shipping label.
